lavaworks.midnightconfig.title: Lavaworks
lavaworks.midnightconfig.instructionsCom: Put the parameters you want in the same index as the appropriate biome.
A list of biomes to be affected by tinting
lavaworks.midnightconfig.lavaColoringEna: Toggles whether or not lava is affected by Resource Providers
lavaworks.midnightconfig.lavaColors.labe:
Hex codes that represent the color of lava
Multiple can be provided if separated by a comma
lavaworks.midnightconfig.magmaColoringEn: Toggles whether or not magma blocks are affected by Resource Providers
lavaworks.midnightconfig.magmaColors.lab:
Hex codes that represent the color of magma blocks
Multiple can be provided if separated by a comma
lavaworks.midnightconfig.chunkReloadComm: §c§l⚠ CHUNKS MAY NEED RELOADED AFTER CHANGING CONFIGS ⚠
lavaworks.midnightconfig.particleColorin: Toggles tinting the particles spawned by lava popping
lavaworks.midnightconfig.magmaResourcePr: Resource Providers used for magma blocks
Parameters that effect the behavior of the selected resource provider for lava
lavaworks.midnightconfig.magmaParameters: Parameters that effect the behavior of the selected resource provider for magma blocks
